hotels.hotel_blog:
Welcome to the prestigious and contemporary Four Points by Sheraton Kochi Infopark, a luxurious haven nestled in the heart of the bustling business district of Infopark Kochi Phase 1 Campus. Our opulent establishment boasts a location that is second to none, providing unrivaled access to the vibrant pulse of Kakkanad.

At Four Points by Sheraton Kochi Infopark, we pride ourselves on offering an exceptional experience, from the moment you step into our modern lobby to the time you retire to your exquisitely appointed room. Our commitment to your comfort and satisfaction knows no bounds.

Our regal King Bed Guest Rooms beckon you to indulge in a lavish retreat, where you'll find a spacious haven furnished with a sumptuous king-sized bed. After a day of exploring the dynamic city, you can refresh yourself in the pristine shower, basking in the invigorating sensation that only our state-of-the-art facilities can provide.

You'll enjoy the blissful embrace of air conditioning, ensuring your stay is as cool and refreshing as it is memorable. Rest assured, our hotel is entirely non-smoking, guaranteeing a breath of fresh air throughout your entire visit.

Stay connected with high-speed Wi-Fi, and quench your thirst with complimentary bottled water. Satisfy your caffeine cravings with our top-of-the-line coffee/tea maker, or indulge in a selection from the well-stocked minibar.

Security is paramount at Four Points by Sheraton Kochi Infopark, with a personal safe in your room to safeguard your valuable belongings. A spacious work desk is at your disposal for productivity, and an LED TV with premium channels promises entertainment at your fingertips.

Our commitment to your convenience extends to our 24-hour room service, ensuring that your every need is met no matter the hour.

In addition to our luxurious rooms, our hotel is replete with outstanding amenities and features. Built in 2018, we offer the epitome of modernity and style. Your vehicle is well taken care of with complimentary on-site parking and valet service.

As the evening descends, indulge in our delightful evening turndown service, a touch of luxury that awaits your return. Maintain your fitness regimen at our well-appointed fitness center, and stay productive with access to a full business center right on-site.

Four Points by Sheraton Kochi Infopark isn't just a hotel; it's a promise of an exceptional experience, an oasis of comfort, and an embodiment of luxury in the heart of Kakkanad. We eagerly await the privilege of hosting your stay and exceeding your every expectation.
